column4: look man, I booted up this morning.. and the username changed...
i do not know what i did to change the user name
but, I did try to change the name@hostname
What did your username change in? Your login?
you need to be more specific.
So, type in whatever your normal login is.
I do not know the hostname of this machine on the ATT/bellsouth network the DSL is plugged into.
For the most part, desktop computers' hostnames are inconsequential
- why does my workspace only show "desk 1"
Perhaps you only have one workspace?
- if I click on it, it zooms to the other windows
Do you mean that it slides the desk to the left or right?
Thats normal, if you want to customize that action, you can install compizconfig-settings-manager
It sounds like compiz is enabled, have you asked the folks in #compiz-fusion about changing the configuration to enable the cube?
- I am looking for extra desktops, virtual space, not eye candy
In the general tab of ccsm you can increase the number of virtual desktops... Horizontal size I believe it is called.
